Description: Weight: half-dīnār. Five line inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: The script of the obverse is very obscure towards the end. The last two letters of 'ṭabʿa' are not present at all and 'thā'' is missing from 'mithqāl'.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (216)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Muḥammad b. al-Ash'ath
